entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM, SSR and CDNs #46734
  • [ClientAssets] Support automagically consuming npm dependencies installed from package.json #46732
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: single_query #46730
  • Changing values on bound InputSelect keeps index selected and not the value #46729
  • Hot reload of scoped css in blazor not working for newly added css files #46728
  • Default ASP.NET 7 React SPA template can't start SPA server without PowerShell #46726
  • MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation not working after Publishing to Azure App Service (Linux) #46723
  • Odd difference: AcceptedAtRoute uses GetUriByAddress. CreatedAtRoute uses GetUriByRouteValues. #46722
  • Blazor Server RedirectToPage results in ambiguous multiple matches #46721
  • Azure SignalR HubConnection does not trigger onClose when ios device locks #46720
  • Deserialization error using [JsonPolymorphic] and [JsonDerivedType] attributes (WEBAPI) #46719

Closed

  • Blazor: Skip the initial validation for dynamically added form content #44433
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #46686
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #46626
  • StatusCodePages middleware returns both JSON Problem Details & plaintext content for responses to requests from browsers #45678
    8.0-preview2
  • Would be nice if Virtualized blazor component keeps a head and a tail of objects #46526
  • ObjectDisposedException when calling JS.InvokeAsync #46617
  • "Unobserved task exception in sender" in Asp.net core SignalR server #46706
  • PasswordHasher CompatibilityMode IdentityV2 not working in .NET 6.0 #45994
    8.0
  • can not use signalr `Clients` in thread? #45656
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Fix AcceptedAtRoute link generation and add tests #46724
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Introducing `IProblemDetailsService.TryWriteAsync` #46680
    8.0-preview2
  • Update to Alpine 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Named pipe caching test #46515
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46716
    area-runtime
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46633
    area-grpc
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46624
    area-grpc
  • [AOT] Add Http.Results RouteValueDictionary overloads #46594
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Add 'dotnet new' web item templates (razor view, api controller, mvc controller) #46714
    area-mvc
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • Retry ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows test #46718
    area-infrastructure
